overview: Said (Hasssan Youssef) was a famous and successful horse races jokey and a loving and faithful husband to his wife Dalal (Soad Hosny); He discovered that she cheats on him and so he had a dangerous heart attack, in the hospital he falls in love with his beautiful nurse Nadia (Mervat Amin), They plan together to murder his wife Dalal ro get rid of her permanently, together they committed the murder successfully, to his great shock he finds that his wife has returned!
title: Fire of Love
